title: League Crashes if I try to open hextech crafting?
body: My league just auto crashes everytime I try to open hextech crafting. Kinda bummed since I wanna get my mastery 6 Nautilus ;_;

replies.body:
We're aware of this issue and are looking into a permanent fix. Some players have been able to resolve this by one of the following steps:

* If running Plays.tv, disable or completely uninstall it
* Install all available [windows updates](http://www.update.microsoft.com/)
* Update [Adobe Air](https://get.adobe.com/air/)

I don't have a timeline on when the full fix will roll out, but please let me know if you have any questions.
dude... happens to me too, every time i click on loot and crafting inventory its just says close program !
